comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: The Ogden standard. (Ogden City, Utah), 01 Feb. 1916. page 1 chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn85058396/1916-02-01/ed-... describes an incident of a British liner, the Appam, being taken by the Germans off Africa and brought to Newport News. Another Bain picture of the liner has further comments:

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content: swanq: Thanks for helping to link together all these different photos of the Appam and people who were on board. We will add more notes to each record to retain that connection.
